page.title: 04REDMARLEY PLAYGROUP by Joe.
page.content: EThe playgroup started in April 1984. It takes place on Tuesday and Thursday mornings from 9.30 _12.00 at Redmarley village hall.Playgroup leader is Mrs. Pam Rowley,helpers are Mrs.Anne Pritch ard and Mrs.Jenny Baxter.There are 25 children on the register.Approximately half are 3 and 4 year olds who stay on their own and half are under 3 whose mothers stay with them.The cost is 60p per session.Activities include sand play _water play,climbing frame with slide,tricycles and other ride on toys wendy house with dressing up clothes, book corner,big building bricks, construction toys,puzzles,games,dolls house,play dough or clay,painting, glueing,cutting and making activities, toy farm and animals,toy garage and cars and train track.The programme includes free play,group discussion, refreshments,ring games and stories.
